from math import factorial as f
for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
	le=[eval(X) for X in raw_input().split()]
	k=int(raw_input())
	le.sort()
	z=le[::-1]
	le=[]
	s=0
	d=0
	for i in xrange(k):
		le.append(z[i])
	o=le[len(le)-1]
	for items in le:
		if items==o:
			s=s+1
	for do in z:
		if do==o:
			d=d+1
	print f(d)/(f(d-s)*f(s))
